title: So my keys just disappeared.
body: Had no time to play last week but logged in to get key fragments, and as i gained 3 key fragments i crafted a key, and after that it just didnt appear whatsoever, relogged and it wasn't there... And now this happened second time... Sooo I lost 2 keeys now :(

replies.body: It looks like you crafted a key earlier, and about a few seconds later used it to open a mastery chest.  It resulted in a Blitzcrank shard which was disenchanted for 263 Blue Essences.  Let me know if that clears things up!

I did it today, but these problems appeared few days ago and a week ago.Really hard to explain how that happened, at that moment only 3 Skins appeared in my loot and chest, no world or or other stuff.

I'm not seeing anything out of the here, but that is pretty strange.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can give you more context and compare.
